General.Name: Interactive Digital Technologies
General.Description: Interactive Digital Technologies Inc. provides telecom, media, information technology and cloud, and geographical information system related professional consulting and implementation services in Taiwan. The company's communication network solutions include cable television network, broadband access networks, transmission networks, IP next generation networks, audio and multimedia networks, 2G/3G wireless networks, IMS, 4G LTE networks, service management systems, fixed networks, and wireless integrated networks, as well as mobile communications related installation and maintenance projects, and mobile communication related RF equipment sales; and media solutions comprise news/program production, digital headend, and FM radio station systems. Its information technology and cloud solutions comprise data center installation, server host, storage systems, network equipment, virtualization platforms, peripheral cloud service related applications, and integrated services; and geographic information solutions comprising customized SI service, application system development, educational training, and consultation services, as well as solutions for environmental protection, disaster prevention and relief, pipelines, transportation, natural resources, social humanities, sanitation and healthcare, national defense, engineering applications, and business analysis. The company also engages in hardware sales and maintenance business. Interactive Digital Technologies Inc. was incorporated in 2003 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 38-1, Wugong 5th Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 24890
